author: rhuijben
msg: In the serf transition based xml parser: provide an explicit error if the root
element isn't matched in the transition table.
Without this most parsers just return success for every invalid element such
as '<html>' when the file contains valid xml.
This requires a better (new) error code which I'll add as a separate commit, to
(svn_ra_serf__xml_cb_start): Expect transitions from the default state to
succeed, by returning an error when it doesn't.

author: mreutegg
msg: JCR-3617: Inconsistent CachingHierarchyManager under concurrent access
This does not fix the root cause, but rather detects the inconsistent state and works around it after it happened.

author: hansbak
msg: applications where not created when status direct to invoice-ready status
